sys_soap_message.name: EzwimESMOrders
sys_soap_message.wsdl_xml:
<definitions name = "ESMOrder" targetNamespace = "http://integration.ezwim.com/wsdl/ESMOrder.wsdl" xmlns = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns = "http://integration.ezwim.com/wsdl/ESMOrder.wsdl" xmlns:xsd = "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
<message name = "ESMOrderRequest"> <part name = "object" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "sysid" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "number" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "short_description" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "comments" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "requested_for" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "priority" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "impact" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "urgency" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "due_date" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "state" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "stage" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "request_state" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "delivery_address" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "price" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "special_instructions" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "approval" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "upon_reject" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "upon_approval" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "sys_domain_path" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "sys_class_name" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "devices" type = "xsd:string"/> </message>
<message name = "ESMOrderResponse"> <part name = "status" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "description" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "id" type = "xsd:string"/> </message>
<portType name = "ESMOrder_PortType"> <operation name = "createOrder"> <input message = "tns:ESMOrderRequest"/> <output message = "tns:ESMOrderResponse"/> </operation> </portType>
<binding name = "ESMOrder_Binding" type = "tns:ESMOrder_PortType"> <soap:binding style = "rpc" transport = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name = "createOrder"> <soap:operation soapAction = "createOrder"/> <input> <soap:body encodingStyle = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" namespace = "urn:ezwim:esmorderservice" use = "encoded"/> </input>
<output> <soap:body encodingStyle = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" namespace = "urn:ezwim:esmorderservice" use = "encoded"/> </output> </operation> </binding>
<service name = "ESMOrder"> <documentation>WSDL File for ESM Orders</documentation> <port binding = "tns:ESMOrder_Binding" name = "ESMOrder_Port"> <soap:address location = "http://integration.ezwim.com/sendOrder/" /> </port> </service> </definitions>
